item.title: Mentioned by Pentiction Western News
item.description:
Albas won't run in new Penticton riding
Come the next federal election, MP Dan Albas will no longer be running in a riding that includes his home town. Despite the best efforts of representatives of Penticton and Summerland, the Federal Electoral Boundaries Commission has decided to draw a ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk Sports AM 1150
item.description:

Summerland Mayor Janice Perrino helps cut the ribbon to open a new roundabout along with Penticton MLA Dan Ashton, Okanagan-Coquihalla MP Dan Albas, a group of local children and others. It may not seem like much, but a new round bout along with a ...

item.title: Mentioned by Kelowna Capital News
item.description:
West Kelowna unveils third phase of Gellatly Road upgrades
West Kelowna Mayor Doug Findlater cuts the ribbon to celebrate the completion of the third phase of Gellatly Road upgrades. Findlater was joined by (from left): Coun. David Knowles, Coun. Carol Zanon, Okanagan-Coquihalla MP Dan Albas, Kelowna-Lake ...

item.title: Mentioned by News Talk Sports AM 1150
item.description:
Okanagan MP's recognized by BC Wine Institute
Kelowna-Lake Country MP Ron Cannan and Okanagan-Coquihalla MP Dan Albas were given the newly created BCWI Industry Recognition Award. Albas says the award stems from their combined work with Bill C-311. "Ron had actually done a lot of ground ...
